tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I would advise everyone to avoid this lady. I dont know about other doctors at Charnock but because of this lady I will personally never go back to the hospital.
*** *** ********* *** ******** **** **** ** ********** ******* We entered and explained we wanted to have a checkup in India for my pregnancy as we were visiting temporarily.*** ******** **** ** **** ****** ***** ** ******* ** **** **** ******* ******** ******** **** ** ****** ******* ******* *** ********** ******* ** *** ******* *********She had the audacity to question my choice to travel to India during pregnancy even though mine is a healthy pregnancy with no restrictions from my doctor so far.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ****** ** ********* ************** *** **** *** **** *** ***** ****** ** ***** ** * *******. My wife has conceived and we went to her for consultation. Before speaking to your patients rudely, kindly behave nicely with them as they come to you for help and guidance. ** **** *********** ********* **** *** ** **** ** **** ********** Do not visit her for recommendation as she will charge you *** **** **** ** *** *********** ********* ***** *** ****** **** *** ****** **** Extremely dissatisfied with her behaviour!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
We visited charnock for our 2nd pregnancy care and treatment. She is very rude *** ********** ******* ********* Very much unexpected behaviour of doctor I have seen 1st time in a big pvt hospital.
As per her everybody should consult doctor before family planning, **** ** **** **** ***************** **** **** *** ** ***** **** ********** * doctor can give confident by explaining every queries. But she started teasing/taunting *** ********* ************ our past experiences, few questions regarding symptoms like vomiting and nausea.
Total dissatisfied *** ** *** ****** ********* ********* and decided to avoid charnock Hospital and planned for next hospital/doctor visit for the same.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Do not recommend her.My wife had a miscarriage in Aug 2021. In 2022 we went to her to plan for a baby. She made all the tests but never asked to test thyroid. When my wife became pregnant and faced some complications and we went to her then she asked us to show the thyroid report and we told her that you did not prescribe TSH test . Knowing this fact she asked me to show her 1 st prescription, when I gave that to her then she added TSH test with the list of  tests prescribed in the 1st prescription . When TSH was done my wife was found with high thyroid. She could not carry healthy pregnancy. *** *** **** ****** ***** *** **** ** *** * ** ************ **** ***** *** ********** **** * ******* *** *** **** ******** ** **** *** * ** *** **** *** **** ******* *** ******** *** ********* ** **** ***** **** *** ** **** *** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** * **** ****** *** ********** *** * **** ************* *** ** ********** ** *** **** *** ***** *** *********** ** *** ********* We had to wait for 1.5 hours. While consultation, she started asking WHY questions to us. I thought she was supposed to answer those questions after taking 800 consultation fee. She recommended multiple tests **** **** ** **** *** ****** ******** ** **** **** *** *** ************ ** ***** ***** ** ***** ** ********** *** ****** ***** ***** ** ** ****** *** *** **** *** ******** ** ******* 
DO NOT GO TO HER FOR ANY CONSULTATION..

tags: None
review: May be she is a good doctor.  But she is not polite neither behaved well with us.  During my check up I called her and asked for a suggestion about my pain relief due to teeth problem.  As because in pregnancy you cant take any medicine, so I asked for that.  She misbehaved and ask me to visit dentist.  If a gyneocologist cant suggest a pain killer during pregnancy then why sould I continue with her.
